item.description:
May 6, 2009

HI!

Peace and blessings!

Just a reminder:
OUR UPCOMING MEETING is going to be on Sunday June 28, at 4:00PM.
PLACE: PEACE ABBEY - located at: Two North Main Street, Sherborn, MA 01770in Sherborn

As you know the format of our meetings is quite simple: we gather to share our reflections and reactions on what we read at home. For our next meeting (JUNE 28) we continue to share and reflect on the book by Matthew Fox "One River, Many Wells" - CHAPTER THREE: "MEDITATION AND MINDFULNESS AND HOLY IMMAGINATION: ART AND RITUAL AS PATHS TO MINDFULNESS (pages 189-254).

Even if you not able to read the material "assigned", don't worry and come anyway. It has been my belief that our simple presence can still foster deep and creative interaction. Hope to see all of you on June 28.

So, mark your calendars and hope to see you at the meeting. Enjoy this book and continuous blessings on your and your loved ones... HAPPY MOTHER'S DAY TO ALL!


PEACE
Fr. Joe, sx
St. Francis Xavier Missionaries

(508) 429-2144
e-mail: pino.ma@gmail.com
